channel.title: Git on 項 思 偉 ~ Aal Izz Well!
channel.description: Recent content in Git on 項 思 偉 ~ Aal Izz Well!

item.title: Building latest git for CentOS
item.description: Install basic packages needed to compile RPMs yum install make gcc perl-ExtUtils-MakeMaker \ rpmdevtools curl-devel expat-devel gettext-devel openssl-devel zlib-devel Get a git SRPM to build from Fedora Package wget https://kojipkgs.fedoraproject.org//packages/git/2.7.5/1.fc24/src/git-2.7.5-1.fc24.src.rpm rpm -i ./git-2.7.5-1.fc24.src.rpm Install dependencies needed to compile git RPMs yum install asciidoc xmlto desktop-file-utils emacs libgnome-keyring-devel \ pkgconfig bash-completion Go to SPECS directory and try to build the RPMs: cd rpmbuild/SPECS/ rpmbuild -ba git.spec Exit the chroot and install the following packages just built

item.title: Clone git repository only some directories
item.description: First, do: git clone --depth 1 [repo-root] [local_dir] Then: cd [local_dir] And lastly: git filter-branch --prune-empty --subdirectory-filter [repo-subdir] HEAD
